name: From the Upper World
description:
In this game you are consiliator. You need to unite the Small one with the Big one with all your tenderness and parience.

Your wards are deeply connected, so you will guide the Small one throw breath of the Big one. When the Big one does inhale the platform uner the Small one leans towrds the center. On the contrary, when it somes to exalation the platform tilts from the center.  Doing inhales and exalations you can save the Small one from sharp and hard things that you meet on the all the way down.

The Big one is very fragile, too. You need to save not only the Small one but extremely important for thouse two brittle things. Try not to crash into something that contains memories and love of the Big and the Small.
